title: My pop culture-obsessed Iraqi nephew narrowly made it to the U.S. during the travel ban pause — but would he make the Metallica concert?
text: My sister said she felt like she was going to throw up. My other sister said she should aim the other way because she wasn't about to repeat the same gross scenario that happened in the family station wagon when they were kids. My mom was too preoccupied scanning the arriving travelers to notice her girls were squabbling, again.
summary:
My sister said she felt like she was going to throw up.
My other sister said she should aim the other way because she wasn't about to repeat the same gross scenario that happened in the family station wagon when they were kids.
My mom was too preoccupied scanning the arriving travelers to notice her girls were squabbling, again.
